data.body: {"Result":{"Id":"20673","Url":"/api/1.0/brand/20673/","ProductsUrl":"/api/1.0/products/2xist~b~20673/","ProductCount":32,"Name":"2(x)ist","SortNames":["2(x)ist"],"LogoSrc":"http://i.stpost.com/2xist~b~20673~160x100.jpg","Reviews":{"ReviewsUrl":"/api/1.0/reviewsbybrand/20673/","ReviewCount":1329,"AverageRating":4.33},"Categories":[],"Description":"Men’s underwear can be functional and fashionable. Just ask 2(x)ist, an increasingly popular American designer of men's underwear and T-shirts. 2(x)ist is the look-no-further brand for men who demand stylish boxers, briefs, boxer briefs, tank tops, T-shirts and long underwear. 2(x)ist underwear is athletically inspired and cut to emphasize a man's physique. And unlike your father's threadbare skivvies, 2(x)ist men's underwear employs such silky soft fabrics as pima cotton, modal and rayon. Their Carbon Collection features underwear with antibacterial, anti-fungal, deodorizing and moisture-wicking properties. And for the environmentally conscious, 2(x)ist has introduced soy, a \"green\" fiber that is softer than cashmere and breathes like cotton. Whether your preference is traditional white or bold patterns, 2(x)ist will show you underwear's potential."}}

Just ask 2(x)ist, an increasingly popular American designer of men's underwear and T-shirts. 2(x)ist is the look-no-further brand for men who demand stylish boxers, briefs, boxer briefs, tank tops, T-shirts and long underwear. 2(x)ist underwear is athletically inspired and cut to emphasize a man's physique. And unlike your father's threadbare skivvies, 2(x)ist men's underwear employs such silky soft fabrics as pima cotton, modal and rayon. Their Carbon Collection features underwear with antibacterial, anti-fungal, deodorizing and moisture-wicking properties. And for the environmentally conscious, 2(x)ist has introduced soy, a \"green\" fiber that is softer than cashmere and breathes like cotton. Whether your preference is traditional white or bold patterns, 2(x)ist will show you underwear's potential."}}
